title: The Amazing Amazon
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 2,333 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 660L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     U and Z1
description: The Amazon rainforest is a rich, living treasure. Filled with more kinds of insects, plants, and animals than anywhere else in the world, the Amazon is a complex and fascinating habitat. The Amazing Amazon provides students a comprehensive look at this intricate world through detailed text and colorful photographs. The book can also be used to teach author's point of view and how to effectively summarize a text. The book and lesson are also available for levels U and Z1.
